venue.name: The Dirt Power Line Parking Lot Near

item.description:
The first picture shows the parking lot under the power line.  The second picture shows a closer view of what the sign on the telephone pole would look like.

 

Here is a link to a trail map.

http://conservation.milfordnh.info/pdf_docs/trail_maps/map_trail_Tucker2pgs.pdf

Please note that the power line parking lot is actually in between 201 and 221 Savage Road.  However, with Google maps, using the address of 321 Savage Road for Milford, NH put me exactly at the power line.  Go figure.


Tucker Brook Town Forest is 285 acres of mostly forested, rolling terrain, and provides excellent hikes in all seasons. I believe the route I plan to take will end up being approximately between 4.5 and 5.1 miles as they don't give a length on some of the trails.  As the whole route is shaded the temperature that day should not be an issue.  There are also some places where the dogs can wade or swim depending on how deep Tucker Brook is where it is near the trail at times.

I plan on starting on the power line trail (2) and quickly turning off it onto Jimmy's Run (3) then taking the lower part of the Fall's Loop (4). Using a short section of the Ridge Trail (1) to take the Lower Path (6). Then using a short section of the Ridge Trail (1) to take the Brook Trail (8) to where it intersects with the Ridge Trail again. We will then start back towards Savage Rd. returning on the Ridge Trail then taking the Forest Trail (7). From where the Forest Trail then reconnects to the Ridge Trail we will follow the Ridge Trail back to the Power Line parking lot on Savage Rd. Any one who can figure out what I just said on the trail map will get a free ice cream on me.  If anyone is interested we can go for an ice cream after the hike.

On parts of the Falls Loop Trail, the Lower Path, and the Brook Trail the trail is either beside or very near Tucker Brook for the water dogs who like to wade or swim. There is also a rather small water fall on the Falls Loop.

Any one wanting a preview can check out the photo album from a previous time we were there:

http://www.meetup.com/Manchester-Doggie-Paws/photos/4236522/
item.how_to_find_us: Turn onto Phelan Road from 101 in Milford and proceed 0.2 miles following the curve in the road to the left. Phelan Road becomes Savage Road. Proceed 0.8 miles and between 201 & 221 Savage Rd turn into the Power Line Parking lot on the left.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Tucker Brook Town Forest 4.5 - 5.1 Mile Hike (approximate)
